sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Migrate demand_user, demand_manager to it_demand_user and it_demand_manager</description>
        <name>Migrate Demand Management Roles</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var itDemandManager = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('it_demand_manager');
var itDemandUser = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('it_demand_user');
var demandManager = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('demand_manager');
var demandUser = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('demand_user');

var wf = session.setWorkflow(true);  // turn workflow on
remapRole(demandManager, itDemandManager);
remapRole(demandUser, itDemandUser);
session.setWorkflow(wf);

function remapRole(fromRole, toRole) {
    new PPMRoleFix().remapRole(fromRole, toRole);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-03-20 06:44:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5913cbd73732310033cb26877e41f105</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Migrate Demand Management Roles</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Demand Management" source="com.snc.demand_management">82005a2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4346</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5913cbd73732310033cb26877e41f105</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-01-13 00:44:24</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
